coreAtributes.name: piped backless sheer pantyhose
coreAtributes.description: A pair of backless piped sheer pantyhose that reach up to the wearer's lower abdomen.

displacementText.playerSelf: You pull your sheer pantyhose down and step out of them.
displacementText.playerNPC: You pull [Npc.name]'s sheer pantyhose down and lift [npc.her] out of them.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab [Npc.name]'s sheer pantyhose and roughly pull them down and lift [npc.her] out of them.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [Npc.name] pulls [npc.her] sheer pantyhose down and step out of them.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [Npc.name] pulls your sheer pantyhose down and lifts you out of them.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [Npc.name] grabs your sheer pantyhose and roughly pulls them down and lifts you out of them.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [Npc1.name] pulls [Npc2.name]'s sheer pantyhose down and lifts [npc2.her] of them.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [Npc1.name] grabs [Npc2.name]'s sheer pantyhose and roughly pulls them down and lifts [npc2.her] out of them.

replacementText.playerSelf: You step into your sheer pantyhose and pull them up.
replacementText.playerNPC: You lift [Npc.name] into [npc.her] sheer pantyhose and pull them up.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You lift [Npc.name] into [npc.her] sheer pantyhose and roughly pull them up.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [Npc.name] steps into [npc.her] sheer pantyhose and pulls them up.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [Npc.name] lifts you into your sheer pantyhose and pulls them up.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [Npc.name] lifts you into your sheer pantyhose and roughly pulls them up.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [Npc1.name] lifts [Npc2.name] into [npc2.her] sheer pantyhose and pulls them up.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [Npc1.name] lifts [Npc2.name] into [npc2.her] sheer pantyhose and roughly pulls them up.

displacementText.playerSelf: You pull your sheer pantyhose down to your knees.
displacementText.playerNPC: You pull [Npc.name]'s sheer pantyhose down to [npc.her] knees.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab [Npc.name]'s sheer pantyhose and roughly pull them down down to [npc.her] knees.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [Npc.name] pulls [npc.her] sheer pantyhose down to [npc.her] knees.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [Npc.name] pulls your sheer pantyhose down to your knees.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [Npc.name] roughly pulls your sheer pantyhose down to your knees.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [Npc1.name] pulls [Npc2.name]'s sheer pantyhose down to [npc2.her] knees.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [Npc1.name] roughly pulls [Npc2.name]'s sheer pantyhose down to [npc2.her] knees.

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull your sheer pantyhose back up to your waist.
replacementText.playerNPC: You pull [Npc.name]'s sheer pantyhose back up to [npc.her] waist.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You roughly pull [Npc.name]'s sheer pantyhose back up to [npc.her] waist.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [Npc.name] pulls [npc.her] sheer pantyhose back up to [npc.her] waist.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [Npc.name] pulls your sheer pantyhose back up to your waist.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [Npc.name] roughly pulls your sheer pantyhose back up to your waist.
